characterabilities.name: Alpha Hunter
characterabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make power attacks without being forced. When this model destroys one or more enemy modes during its activation, warbeasts in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Metamorphose

ability.name: Energy Siphon
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus, fury, or essence points on it, that model loses 1 focus, fury or essence point and this model gains 1 focus or fury point.

spells.name: Bracer
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM. The affected model and any friendly models B2B with it have Steady, cannot be pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down)

spells.name: Hex Bolt
spells.description: Models hit by Hex Bolt cannot make special actions, special attacks, or power attacks for one round.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Forsaken] [Ashen Veil]

characterabilities.name: Resourceful

feat.description: Remove all damage from models in Absylonia's battlegroup that are currently in her Control range. Additionally, while in Absylonia's Control range models in her battlegroup gain Rapid Healing, Panacea lasts for one round. (When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved remove d3 damage points from it.)

Then distribute 2 additional flesh web tokens for each non-lesser warbeast in her battlegroup among one or more living friendly Faction models currently in her Control range. A model can transfer to another living friendly model in Bethayne’s Control range as if it had the transferring Damage warlock special rule without spending furry by spending a flesh web token. Flesh Web lasts for one round, when Flesh Web expires remove all flesh web tokens from friendly Faction models.

products.name: Bethayne, Voice of Everblight and Belphagor

characterabilities.name: Flesh Meld
characterabilities.description:
Bethayne can use Flesh Meld at any time during her activation while B2B with a Belphagor model in her battlegroup. Remove Bethanye from the table. Upkeep spells she cast do not immediately expire, and warbeasts in her battlegroup do not go wild. Any effects on Bethayne when she melds are applied to Belphagor. Remove the fury currently on Belphagor. If there are any fury on Bethayne when she melds, place them on Belphagor. Belphegor cannot activate later in the turn in which it becomes flesh melded.

While melded, Belphagor becomes a warlock warrior model, loses Soulless, takes Control of Bethayne's battlegroup, and can upkeep spells cast by Bethayne. While melded, Belphagor's base CMD becomes 9 and it's base ARC and AAT becomes 7. While melded, Belphagor can cast Bethayne's spells and use her feat. While melded, Belphagor is not considered to be a warbeast and loses it's animus. While melded, Belphagr can make slam and throw power attacks without being forced. While melded, Belphagor suffers damage like a warbeast but does not suffer the effects of crippled aspects. Effects modifying the amount of damage to or the manner in which damage is applied to a warbeast still apply to Belphagor, even while it is melded. If Belphagor is destroyed or removed from play while melded, Bethayne is destroyed.

Bethayne can separate from Belphagor during your Maintenance Phase. When she returns to play, place her B2B with Belphagor. Bethayne returns to play with the same amount of damage she had when she left the table. After Bethayne returns to play, she can upkeep spells cast by Belphagor when they were melded.

feat.name: Arcane Symbiosis
feat.description: While in Bethayne's Control range, friendly models gain boosted magic accuracy and damage rolls. Arcane Symbiosis lasts for one round.

If Rhyas activates and is outside of Saeryn's Control range, she must immediately use her movement action to move back into Saeryn's Control range, if her movement would be insufficient to get back into Saeryn's Control range, she must run to move back into Saeryn's Control range.

You can choose to return Saeryn or Rhyas to play even if they were removed from play. Place the returned model completely within 3" of the model that used Conjoined Spirits. The returned model comes into play with a number of fury points equal to it's ARC. After Conjoined Spirits is used, Saeryn and Rhyas cannot advance for the rest of the turn. If either Seryn or Rhyas is damaged by an attack made by the other, they both lose Conjoined Spirits for the rest of the game.

characterabilities.description: If this model has fewer than five corpse tokens on it at any time during its activation, it can take corpse tokens from any other model in its unit in formation up to its limit of five.

characterabilities.name: Carried
characterabilities.description: This model is not a warrior model. It can advance only during its unit's Normal Movement. When it advances, it can move up to 1” for each Grunt in this unit within 2” of it at the beginning of this unit's activation. This model is automatically hit by melee attacks. It cannot become stationary or knocked down and never suffers Blind.

characterabilities.name: Focal Point
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed or removed from play, remove the remaining models in this unit from play.

characterabilities.name: Spawn Abomination (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Remove five corpse tokens from this model to place a non-character Faction Light warbeast into play under your control. Place the warbeast completely within 3” of this model and choose a friendly Faction battlegroup commander. This warbeast becomes part of that battlegroup commander's Battlegroup. This model can activate normally this turn.

characterabilities.name: Spawn Terror
characterabilities.description: Remove three corpse tokens from this model to place a non-character Faction lesser warbeast into play under your control. Place the warbeast completely within 3” of this model and choose a friendly Faction battlegroup commander. This warbeast becomes part of that battlegroup commander's Battlegroup. This model can activate normally this turn.

characterabilities.name: Bag Man
characterabilities.description: A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. When this model boxes a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack, this model gains the boxed model's corpse token and the boxed model is removed from play. This model can have up to one corpse token at any time.

ability.name: Man Catcher
ability.description: A warrior model hit by this attack suffers -2 DEF and cannot advance while within the model's melee range.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Critical Grievous Wounds
ability.description: On a critical hit, a model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Lure
ability.description: Friendly warbeasts can charge enemy models hit by this weapon this turn without being forced.

characterabilities.name: Blade Shield

characterabilities.name: Berserk

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding

If this model is destroyed or removed from play, the Tentacles in its unit are removed from play. If a Tentacle in this unit moves or is placed outside this model's command range, remove the Tentacle from play.

ability.name: Back Attack
ability.description: When declaring attacks with this weapon, this model can target models in its back arc. When making an attack with this weapon, this model's melee range is not limited to its front arc.

characterabilities.name: Leadership [Blighted Ogrun] [Rise]

characterabilities.name: Rise

characterabilities.name: Spiritual Conduit

characterabilities.name: Battle Wizard

characterabilities.name: Granted [Shadow bind]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Shadow bind. (A model hit by a weapon with Shadow Bind suffers Shadow Bind for one round. (A model suffering shadow Bind suffers -3 DEF, and for one round when it advances it cannot move except to change facing. Shadow Bind can be shaken.))

After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Circel Orboros, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Circel Orboros, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia, Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia, Thornfall Alliance armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Spirit Bind
characterabilities.description: When a living warbeast in this model's command range is destroyed by an attack, you can remove this model from play to use Spirit Bind. If you do, the warbeast is not destroyed and remains on the table under your control. If multiple models with Spirit Bind attempt to Bind only the closest model does so. Remove 2 damage points from each of the warbeast's aspects. The warbeast becomes a friendly Mercenary Solo model, gains Undead, no longer belongs to a battlegroup, and cannot be healed. The controller of the warbeast, if able, may reave fury points on the warbeast as if it had been destroyed, and all remaining fury are removed. The warbeast cannot be forced, and loses its animus.

characterabilities.name: Spirit Disbinding
characterabilities.description: At the start of your maintenance phase, you may choose to disable a warbeast that the Feralgeist has used Spirit Bind on. If the warbeast this model has used Spirit Bind on is disabled, immediately place the Feralgeist within 3” of that warbeast. If the warbeast is disabled by an enemy attack, the Feralgeist loses Spectre for one turn.

ability.name: Paralysis
ability.description: A living model hit by this weapon has its base DEF reduced to 5 and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. Paralysis lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Maltreatment

The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Targ]

A model can frenzy even if it has already activated this turn, and it can activate later this turn even if it frenzies as a result of Monster Mayhem. When a warbeast is frenzied as a result of Monster Mayhem, you can choose the warbeast's frenzy target if the target is currently in Arkadius' Control range.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Reconnaissance (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Choose one enemy model or unit with ambush that has not yet been put into play. Its controller must immediately deploy the chosen model or unit. This ability can only be used once per game.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Prey]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Prey. (After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. A model with Prey gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.)

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Take Down]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Take Down. (Models disabled by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.)

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Supernal Coalition, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods]

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

ability.name: Batter
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's activation, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1” directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1” directly toward it.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

characterabilities.name: Finisher
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on damage rolls against damaged models.

characterabilities.name: Impervious Flesh
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Circle Orboros, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Circle Orboros, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Thornfall Alliance armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Relentless Charge
characterabilities.description: While advancing as part of a charge, this model gains Pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Rise
characterabilities.description: If this model is knocked down at the beginning of your Maintenance Phase, it stands up.

characterabilities.name: Take Down
characterabilities.description: Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

ability.name: Powerful Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge accuracy rolls with this weapon.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Circle Orboros, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Circle Orboros, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Blindwater Congregation]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Blindwater Congregation armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

topability.name: Prayers
topability.description: This unit's Leader can use the following prayers at any time during each of its unit's activations. Each model in this unit gains the benefits listed.

subabilities.name: Dirge of Mists
subabilities.description: Affected models gain concealment. Models are not affected while out of formation. Dirge of Mists lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Offerings To Kossk
subabilities.description: Affected models can reroll missed attack rolls. Each roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Offerings to Kossk. Offerings to Kossk lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Predator's Prayer
subabilities.description: Affected models gain Bloodthirst this activation. (Bloodthirst - When it charges a living model, a model with Bloodthirst gains +2" movement.)

characterabilities.name: Arcane Support
characterabilities.description: While this model is in its warcaster/warlock's Control range, the warcaster/warlock can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Battle Wizard
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one Magic ability special attack or special action.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Blindwater Congregation]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Blindwater Congregation armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Trollbloods armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Marionette (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Marionette is a RNG 10 arcane attack. Target enemy model/unit. You can have one afffected model reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Marionette expires. Marionette lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Puppet Master (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Puppet Master is a RNG 10 spell. When it targets an enemy model/unit, it is a magic attack. You can have one affected model reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Puppet Master expires. Puppet Master lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Spell Slave (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: This model must be in it's Leader's Control Range to make the Spell Slave special action. When it does, it casts one of the spells on it's warcaster's card with a COST of 3 or less. This model cannot cast upkeep spells or spells with a RNG of SELF or CTRL. When casting an offensive spell, Spell Slave in a magic attack. Use this model's Magic Ability score when making magic accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Critical Consume
ability.description: On a critical hit, if the attack hits a small-based non-Leader model the model hit is removed from play.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2” of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
